评论概述: Comfy, but not shaped right for short or curvy people
评论详情: SIZING: I'm 5'3", 135 lbs, with 39" hips and 30" waist. I ordered a Medium, and while I expected they might be a bit long (which they were), I wasn't prepared for them to be too narrow around the hips and thighs.  FULL REVIEW: I don't have nearly enough cargo pants in my life, and I thought this pair would help flesh out my wardrobe a bit. The fabric is more comfortable than it would initially seem; it's the kind that wicks moisture away and keeps the weather out, yet it's soft against the skin. The color is nice and true-to-screen too.  I just wish this pair of pants fit me better. The excess length alone would have probably been manageable, but the fact that the thigh and hip area doesn't fit me is unfortunately a deal-breaker. I will be gifting these pants to someone with a taller and skinnier frame than mine.

评论概述: Cute, but runs small, so size up!
评论详情: I love the cut, style, and the fabric. Fabric is very lightweight and comfortable but doesn’t feel too flimsy. Seams and stitching are all straight, strong and neatly finished. Snaps are plastic. The size chart is not very good. Chart states measurements are in inches but clearly they are in centimeters. Pants also seem to run small. XL looks like a US size 10/12. Actual product in size XL measures at 30” at the waist (+2-3” if stretched) and about 36-38” in the hip. Very cute and probably comfortable too if you get the fit right.
